entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] ContentPage.OnAppearing is not getting called #3216
  • [Bug] PanGestureRecognizer stops firing the PanUpdated event if the target control is removed and re-added to the container #3215
  • [Bug] BoxView loses background color when its parent is removed and re-added to the container #3214
  • [Bug] On iOS: The type initializer for 'SQLite.SQLiteConnection' threw an exception (Android works) #3211
  • [Bug] When showing DisplayActionSheet first time, custom control (ViewRenderer) that is placed in same page is recreated #3210
  • Unable to download dotnet-install script when behind a proxy server #3209
  • Unable to debug android emulator #3208

Closed

  • [Bug] Current Remap strategy inside controls doesn't work when Element is referenced inside App.Xaml Style #2935
  • [Bug] ToolbarItem handler is not getting called #3217
  • [Bug] Shell TitleColor in UWP #3076
  • [Bug] Shell FlyoutBackgroundColor property has no effect #3030
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Shell, WinUI] Shell.SetNavBarIsVisible #1630
  • [Enhancement] Add ability to embed the wwwroot web files when using Blazor Wpf and WinForms controls #1520

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Forms DeviceInfo and use Essentials #3213
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • [compatibility] IsTrimmable support, fix linker warnings #3161
  • Clean up Shell Chrome Behaviors #3165
    area/shell 🐢
  • BlazorWebView support for loading custom static assets #3191
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3195
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Implement .NET 6 features for templates. #3018
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Multi Window Support #2811
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [X] Incremental SourceGenerator #2772
    area/Xaml </>, do-not-merge
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Remove usage of IsolatedStorage #2710
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Set up for unpackaged app projects #3172
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add IHighlightLayer #3205
